analysis.description:
XpressPresale.wallet (/unique_chucks/19/0x2f7b4b11001e3c8c544ec00a129b4afd90a662cf.sol#570) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.wallet (/unique_chucks/19/0x2f7b4b11001e3c8c544ec00a129b4afd90a662cf.sol#128-129)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x2f7b4b11001e3c8c544ec00a129b4afd90a662cf.sol#173-191) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x2f7b4b11001e3c8c544ec00a129b4afd90a662cf.sol#186)

XpressPresale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x2f7b4b11001e3c8c544ec00a129b4afd90a662cf.sol#597-604) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x2f7b4b11001e3c8c544ec00a129b4afd90a662cf.sol)

XpressPresale.finalization (/unique_chucks/19/0x2f7b4b11001e3c8c544ec00a129b4afd90a662cf.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(tokenbeneficiary,300000000000000) (/unique_chucks/19/0x2f7b4b11001e3c8c544ec00a129b4afd90a662cf.sol)
